name: It Takes 4our
description:
Would you like to try an unconventional way to play a plataformer?

With "It Takes 4our" now you can! 

Help our champion Bibilulu to cross the map and reach the other side, but you won't be alone in this mission! Bek and Lek are here to help, each one doing the best they can!

Use them to control the joystick and move Bibilulu!

Go now! It takes four to complete this challenge!

=============================

Cheats: 

Out of patience ? Don't worry!

You can press "=" to jump to the end of the level!

=============================
